Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Enum Constants
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    org.optaplanner.core.api.domain.solution.Solution
    Use PlanningScore, ProblemFactCollectionProperty and ProblemFactProperty instead. Will be removed in 8.0.
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.optaplanner.core.impl.domain.solution.AbstractSolution
    Use PlanningSolution.autoDiscoverMemberType() instead.
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    org.optaplanner.core.config.score.director.ScoreDirectorFactoryConfig.bendableHardLevelsSize
    org.optaplanner.core.config.score.director.ScoreDirectorFactoryConfig.bendableSoftLevelsSize
    org.optaplanner.core.config.score.director.ScoreDirectorFactoryConfig.kieBase
    org.optaplanner.core.config.score.director.ScoreDirectorFactoryConfig.scoreDefinitionClass
    org.optaplanner.core.config.score.director.ScoreDirectorFactoryConfig.scoreDefinitionType
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.optaplanner.core.config.score.director.ScoreDirectorFactoryConfig.getBendableHardLevelsSize()
    Use PlanningScore.bendableHardLevelsSize() instead. Will be removed in 8.0.
    org.optaplanner.core.config.score.director.ScoreDirectorFactoryConfig.getBendableSoftLevelsSize()
    Use PlanningScore.bendableSoftLevelsSize() instead. Will be removed in 8.0.
    org.optaplanner.core.config.solver.termination.TerminationConfig.getCalculateCountLimit()
    Use TerminationConfig.getScoreCalculationCountLimit() instead. Will be removed in 8.0.
    org.optaplanner.core.config.score.director.ScoreDirectorFactoryConfig.getKieBase()
    Use ScoreDirectorFactoryConfig.setKsessionName(String) and SolverFactory.createFromKieContainerXmlResource(KieContainer, String) instead. Might be removed in 8.0.
    org.optaplanner.core.config.score.director.ScoreDirectorFactoryConfig.getScoreDefinitionClass()
    Use PlanningScore.scoreDefinitionClass() instead. Will be removed in 8.0.
    org.optaplanner.core.config.score.director.ScoreDirectorFactoryConfig.getScoreDefinitionType()
    Use PlanningScore instead. Will be removed in 8.0.
    org.optaplanner.core.api.solver.event.BestSolutionChangedEvent.isNewBestSolutionInitialized()
    Use BestSolutionChangedEvent.getNewBestScore()'s Score.isSolutionInitialized() instead. Will be removed in 8.0.
    org.optaplanner.core.config.score.director.ScoreDirectorFactoryConfig.setBendableHardLevelsSize(Integer)
    Use PlanningScore.bendableHardLevelsSize() instead. Will be removed in 8.0.
    org.optaplanner.core.config.score.director.ScoreDirectorFactoryConfig.setBendableSoftLevelsSize(Integer)
    Use PlanningScore.bendableSoftLevelsSize() instead. Will be removed in 8.0.
    org.optaplanner.core.config.solver.termination.TerminationConfig.setCalculateCountLimit(Long)
    Use TerminationConfig.setScoreCalculationCountLimit(Long) instead. Will be removed in 8.0.
    org.optaplanner.core.config.score.director.ScoreDirectorFactoryConfig.setKieBase(KieBase)
    Use ScoreDirectorFactoryConfig.setKsessionName(String) and SolverFactory.createFromKieContainerXmlResource(KieContainer, String) instead. Might be removed in 8.0.
    org.optaplanner.core.config.score.director.ScoreDirectorFactoryConfig.setScoreDefinitionClass(Class<? extends ScoreDefinition>)
    Use PlanningScore.scoreDefinitionClass() instead. Will be removed in 8.0.
    org.optaplanner.core.config.score.director.ScoreDirectorFactoryConfig.setScoreDefinitionType(ScoreDefinitionType)
    Use PlanningScore instead. Will be removed in 8.0.
  • Deprecated Enum Constants 
    Enum Constant and Description
    org.optaplanner.benchmark.config.statistic.ProblemStatisticType.CALCULATE_COUNT_PER_SECOND
    Use ProblemStatisticType.SCORE_CALCULATION_SPEED instead. Will be removed in 8.0.
    org.optaplanner.core.config.solver.EnvironmentMode.PRODUCTION
    Use EnvironmentMode.NON_REPRODUCIBLE instead. Will be removed in 8.0.
